title: For the building having height more than 36 m
clause_text: For the building having height more than 36 m., the minimum road width shall be 12 m. and for building having height equal to or more than 50 m., the minimum road width shall be 15 m.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: For the building having height more than 36 m., the minimum road width shall be 12 m. and for building having height equal to or more than 50 m., the minimum road width shall be 15 m.
